sentences.en: After going through Switzerland you came to the Austrian frontier at Feldkirch.
sentences.cn: 穿过了瑞士,我们到达奥地利边境的菲德科尔契.

sentences.en: Archives of Austria - Links to and addresses of Austrian archives.
sentences.cn: 档案馆奥地利 - 联系地址和奥地利的档案.

sentences.en: Austrian euro coins have a unique design for each denomination, with a common theme for each of the three series of coins.
sentences.cn: 奥地利的欧元硬币对于每个货币的命名有着唯一的设计，三个系列的硬币有着共同的设计主题。

sentences.en: Austrian voters went to the polls this weekend to elect a successor to the President.
sentences.cn: 奥地利选民这周末去投票中心选举下届总统。

sentences.en: Austrian wine styles are often bracketed with those of northern Germany.
sentences.cn: 人们往往把奥地利葡萄酒的风味与德国北部葡萄酒的风味相提并论。

sentences.en: He hammered the young Austrian player in four straight sets.
sentences.cn: 他直落4局轻取年轻的奥地利对手。

sentences.en: His features are strong and masculine, with an Austrian lip and arched nose, his complexion olive.
sentences.cn: 他的仪表威武英俊, 有着奥地利人的嘴唇、鹰钩鼻子 、 棕黄色面皮.

sentences.en: I looked across the wire at the Austrian lines.
sentences.cn: 我隔着铁丝网望望奥军的阵地.

sentences.en: In recent years the Austrian economy has outperformed most other industrial economies.
sentences.cn: 近几年，奥地利的经济发展超过了其他多数工业国。

sentences.en: She quotes an Austrian banker as saying: “I always find it easier to do business [in English] with partners from Greece or Russia or Denmark.
sentences.cn: 她引用了一位奥地利银行家的话称：“我总是发现，（用英语）和希腊、俄罗斯或丹麦人做生意更容易一些。

sentences.en: The Austrian trenches were above on the hillside only a few yards from the Italian lines.
sentences.cn: 奥军的战壕就挖在山坡上,距离意军阵地只有数码远.

sentences.en: The core of truth in the Austrian theory needs to be discovered.
sentences.cn: 奥地利学说的中心真理需要找出来.

sentences.en: The entire country rose up and drove the Austrian soldiers from their homeland.
sentences.cn: 全国人民奋起反抗,把奥军从他们的国土上驱逐出去.

sentences.en: The group has adventured as far as the Austrian alps.
sentences.cn: 该队伍的探险之旅远至奥地利的阿尔卑斯山。

sentences.en: The tennis star has parted company with his Austrian trainer.
sentences.cn: 这位网球明星与他的奥地利教练分道扬镳。

sentences.en: This freed the Austrian army to operate against the French.
sentences.cn: 这使得奥地利军队可以对法军作战。

sentences.en: Unfortunately the German - Austrian clergy completely failed to counter this procedure.
sentences.cn: 不幸的是,奥地利的德 裔 神职人员完全没能对抗这一进程.

sentences.en: When I began to cough, I blamed it on the Austrian cigarettes.
sentences.cn: 当我开始咳嗽时，我把这事怪在抽奥地利的香烟上。

trans.tran_cn: 奥地利的；奥地利人的；奥地利文化的
trans.tran_en: relating to Austria or its people
